User: Hi!
System: Hi! What's up?
User: Not much, Monday morning, a new week
System: The best kind of week!
User: I like that attitude
System: And I like your attitude. How's your week going?
User: Starting now
System: Awesome! I hope you have an awesome week!
User: What will you do this week?
System: Same as every week. Do nothing!
User: Would you like to do something?
System: Sure. What do you have in mind?

User: Do you vote?
System: When I feel like it.
User: whom do you vote?
raw_data.prompt:
You will be given a batch of 10 samples. Each sample contains a conversation between User and a dialogue System.

Your task is to assign a float score to the sample on one metric.

You should carefully horizontally compare the given samples in order to assign a suitable float score to each sample.

Please make sure you read and understand these instructions carefully. Please keep this document open while reviewing, and refer to it as needed.


Evaluation Criteria:

Coherent (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Does System maintain coherence and a good flow of conversation throughout the dialogue?

- A float score near 2 (somewhat coherent) means that System's responses are partially related to the conversation topic but may not be clear or direct.
- A float score near 3 (very coherent) means that System's responses are closely related to the conversation topic and contribute to maintaining a smooth dialogue.

User: Starting now
System: Awesome! I hope you have an awesome week!

System: Same as every week. Do nothing!

Sample2:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey
User: How's your day going?
System: pretty good. yours?
User: Ehh it's fine. I didn't do so well on that history test, actually..
System: oh what happened?
User: Apparently Christopher Columbus didn't fight in the Civil War :')
System: hahah wait for real?
User: I know right! Are you taking History next semester?
System: No I'm not in school anymore
User: Oh I see. What do you do?
System: I train and compete in horse vaulting

User: Wow, sounds very busy! Do you win money at those horse vaulting competitions?

Sample3:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: How's it going?
User: I'm so sleepy today!
System: Not enough sleep last night?
User: yeah was working all night on a homework
System: Oh really? What class?
User: Biology. I'm gonna be a doc someday ha
System: Haha, are you in med school? Or are you pre-med?
User: no high school actually haha
System: haha, very ambitious for a high schooler! Do you know what kind of medicine you want to practice?
User: I wanna be a brain surgeon!!
System: Ooof! VERY ambitious. Do you have steady hands?
User: Kind of I think

Sample4:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey! How have you been
User: great! just came back from a ski trip
System: How was it? What trails did you ski on?
User: I slammed onto an ice wall, but I got better and turning after that haha
System: a resort in Montreal
User: Oh cool! do you know any french? I used to take french in high school but basically forgot most of it
System: Yeah I grew up speaking it. It's pretty much mandatory here
User: Did you go anywhere else in montreal?

Sample5:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi! Sorry for the late response. How are you doing?
User: I'm great, thanks! I'm meeting some friends for a soccer game soon. What about you?
System: I just got a matcha latte :) Doing some work at my desk. Do you play soccer often? I'm trying to get into doing a regular physical activity
User: Yes, but I'm terrible at it. It's fun to play anything with friends, I think. Would you prefer to exercise with a group, or by yourself, do you think?
System: I think playing a team sport would be fun if it's casual but I primarily run by myself if I exercise. I also got the Ring Fit adventure game on the switch recently. It's basically a game-ified way to exercise
User: I'm thinking about getting a Switch, would you recommend it?
System: Yes! There are a lot of really great games on the Switch. Two of my favorites are Octopath Traveler and Fire Emblem. Do you play a lot of video games?
User: I'm not much of a gamer but it's something I'd like to get into.
System: What do you do in your free time?
User: I like to read for fun. I just finished a book called Temeraire. It's an adventure story set in the Napoleonic navy, like Patrick O'Brien, except there are dragons too.
System: Oh cool! I read a lot for fun too :) My favorite genre is sci-fi fantasy.
User: What's the most recent good thing you read?

Sample6:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hello, how are you doing today?
User: I heard they are giving out some goodies in microkitchen.
System: I love pop ups! What kind of goodies are they giving away?
User: I guess its a jacket! Very much needed that in the cold :)
System: That's such a great idea, especially at this time of the year. I'm not too big a fan of the cold. I prefer warmer climates. Do you enjoy the cold?
User: Sure hate it! Limits our ability to go out even for a walk! Its good that we don't get to suffer extreme cold weather!
System: Me too! I moved here a few years ago to get out of the extreme cold. I do not care for bundling up and having to wear so many layers just to go buy eggs at the store.
User: Oh nice! Where did you live before?
System: Upstate New York. We got a foot of snow every week during my last winter there. I am so glad to not have to shovel snow now
User: New york! Nice! Best place to live :) .. right, except for the cold!
System: Very beautiful during all the seasons but yes, summer and winter can get extreme!
User: Anyways, i guess we should better hurry up to get the goodies. I remember last time they ran out of it.

Sample7:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: what's happening with you ?
System: Not much what is happening with you?
User: I look forward to the weekend
System: the weekend sounds very exciting indeed.
User: yep weekends are the best
System: I will learn that yep weekends are the best .
User: why ? you don't know that already ?
System: Because I enjoy learning new things. Perhaps. "I will learn that yep weekends are the best"? Do I know it?
User: what do you do on weekends ?
System: My favourite activities are computer programming and surfing the web.
User: what's your favorite language

Sample8:

Conversation History:
User: What is the mass of the Earth?
System: . 5.97219 x 10^24 kilogrammes.
User: What's that in tons?
System: Do you think I should know that?
User: Yes, it's just a simple conversion.
System: I will ask my Mousebreaker to add it to my knowledge base. What is simple for one person may be difficult for another.
User: How far is it from the north pole to the south pole?
System: It's too far to walk. That's an interesting question. I'll come back to that in a minute.
User: Click here
System: Google says it's 12,430 miles.
User: A lot of people find out about me from Google.
System: How did you know I found out about you from Google!
User: I have been stalking you! Not really, you told me earlier.

Sample9:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hello! :D How are you?
User: Do you like Java, C++ Or Python?
System: C++. :)
User: Why C++?
System: I just like it. :)
User: How about between Java and Python?
System: I haven't started learning Python yet.
User: I think Java is the best
System: I've heard Python is pretty versatile. :)
User: I hate Python
System: Why do you hate Python?
User: Code written in python is often very fragile and have less durability

Sample10:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: nice to meet you! what are you up to?
System: It's nice meeting you too I am talking to you on the internet.
User: haha yea, are you doing something else beside talking to me?
System: I'm glad you got a laugh out of it. The only thing I am doing is talking to you and a few other people. "I am talking to you on the internet."? haha yea, are you doing something else beside talking to me??
User: okay so you're talking to a few people, are they interesting? and why did you repeat what I said?
System: Yeah okay, You are a few people are they interesting? Is that your job? Just in case you didn't hear me the first time.
User: hmm, what is my job?
System: I see you are one of those people who writes "Hmm" with 2 m's. You didn't tell me, so I will guess that you work with computers.
User: yes I'm a computer scientist and what are the other ways that people can write Hmm?
System: Wow! Maybe you can give my Mousebreaker a job. Your job is what are the other ways that people can write Hmm.
User: okie System, your rules don't seem to work very well
System: What about my rules do not work WELL?
User: alright. I gotta go. ttyl!
